coreFeatures.description: You've completed training in a specialized School of Magic. Choose a Spell School. You gain the following benefits:

choices.prompt: Choose a Spell School to specialize in.

options.name: Astromancy
options.description: Magic focused on stars, time, and cosmic forces.

options.name: Conjuration
options.description: Magic that summons creatures and objects from other planes.

options.name: Destruction
options.description: Magic focused on dealing damage and breaking things.

options.name: Divination
options.description: Magic that reveals information and sees the future.

options.name: Enchantment
options.description: Magic that influences minds and emotions.

options.name: Illusion
options.description: Magic that deceives the senses and creates false realities.

options.name: Protection
options.description: Magic that shields and defends against harm.

options.name: Restoration
options.description: Magic that heals, repairs, and restores.

options.name: Transmutation
options.description: Magic that changes and transforms matter and energy.

options.name: Abjuration
options.description: Magic that banishes, wards, and negates other magic.

benefits.name: School Magic
benefits.description: You learn 1 Arcane Cantrip and 1 Arcane Spell from this Spell School.

benefits.name: Signature School
benefits.description: When you cast a Spell from the chosen School, you can reduce its MP cost by 1. Its total MP cost before the reduction still can't exceed your Mana Spend Limit. You can use this Feature once per Long Rest, but regain the ability to use it again when you roll for Initiative.

coreFeatures.description: You can spend 1 AP and 1 MP to create a 1 Space diameter Arcane Sigil on the ground beneath you that lasts for 1 minute. When you create an Arcane Sigil choose 1 Spell School (Enchantment, Necromancy, Protection, etc.) or 1 Spell Tag (Fire, Cold, Teleportation, etc.). The Arcane Sigil radiates magic of the chosen type.

benefits.name: Using a Sigil
benefits.description: While a creature is within the area of your Arcane Sigil, it has ADV on Spell Checks to cast or produce the effects of Spells with the chosen Spell School or Spell Tag.

benefits.name: Moving a Sigil
benefits.description: You can spend 1 AP to teleport one of your Sigils within 10 spaces to your current space, but multiple Sigils can't coexist in the same Space.

coreFeatures.description: You learn 1 Arcane Spell with the Ritual Spell Tag each time you gain a Wizard Class Feature (including this one). You can only gain this benefit once per Level. Additionally, when you encounter an Arcane Spell with the Ritual Spell Tag in a form you can study (such as a spellbook, a spell scroll, or from an instructor), you can spend a number of hours equal to the Spell's base MP cost to learn it. You can only cast Spells you learn with this feature as Rituals, unless you learned it from another source.
When you complete a Long Rest, choose 1 Spell you know. The chosen Spell becomes your Prepared Spell until your next Long Rest. Your Prepared Spell gains the following benefits:

benefits.name: Mana Limit Break
benefits.description: When you cast this Spell, you can increase your Mana Spend Limit by 1. You can use this Feature once per Long Rest, but you regain the ability to use it when you roll for Initiative.

benefits.name: Rehearsed Casting
benefits.description: During a Spell Duel, Challengers have DisADV on Spell Checks to stop your Spell.

coreFeatures.description: You gain 1 Talent of your choice. If the Talent has any prerequisites, you must meet those prerequisites to choose that Talent.

features.description: When you use your Arcane Sigil Feature, you can spend 1 additional MP to create 1 intangible Arcane Portal in a Space you can see within 10 Spaces that is linked to the Sigil. The Portal disappears when its linked Arcane Sigil ends. It grants the following benefits:

benefits.name: Arcane Portal
benefits.description: Creatures of your choice within 1 Space of the Sigil or Portal can spend 1 Space of Movement to teleport to an unoccupied Space within 1 Space of the linked Sigil or Portal.

benefits.name: Linked Magic
benefits.description: While within 1 Space of the Sigil or Portal, you can cast a Spell or make an Attack as if you were standing in the Space of the linked Sigil or Portal. When you do, you gain the benefits of the Arcane Sigil, regardless of where you're standing.

benefits.name: Teleportation Expert
benefits.description: When you learn a new Spell, you can choose any Spell with the Teleportation Spell Tag.

features.description: You have ADV on Checks to learn about the Astromancy Spell School (such as Teleportation magic or Portals). Additionally, if you spend 1 minute observing a portal or teleportation runes, you can make a DC 10 Spell Check to try to understand the inner mechanism of a Portal within 5 Spaces. Success: You learn where it leads to and for how long it has been open. Success (5): You learn how to activate and deactivate it (such as its passphrase, procedures, or any required special item).

You learn 1 Spell of your choice with the Curse Spell Tag. When you learn a new Spell, you can choose any Spell with the Curse Spell Tag. Spells with the Curse Spell Tag count as being part of your chosen Spell School for the purposes of your Spell School Initiate Feature.

You gain the Spell Enhancements listed below, which you can add to any Spell you cast. You can only use 1 of these Spell Enhancements per Spell you cast. MP spent on these Spell Enhancements doesn't count against your Mana Spend Limit. When you use one of these Spell Enhancements, 1 creature of your choice that's targeted by the Spell must make a Repeated Charisma Save against your Spell Check. If the Spell doesn't normally require a Spell Check, you must make one when using one of these Spell Enhancements. Save Failure: The target is subjected to the chosen Hex effects for 1 minute.

choices.prompt: Choose a Hex to apply to the spell.

options.name: Bewitching Hex (1 MP)
options.description: The target becomes Charmed by you for the duration.

options.name: Reaping/Life Hex (1 MP)
options.description: The target takes 1 True damage and you regain 1 HP. This effect repeats at the end of each of its turns for the duration.

options.name: Vermin Hex (1 MP)
options.description: The target can't speak and if its Size is Large or smaller its Size decreases by 1. Its Size decreases by 1 again at the end of each of its turns for the duration until it's tiny.

features.description: You can spend 1 minute focusing your mind to detect the presence of Curses within 20 Spaces. You learn the location of any Cursed creature or Cursed object within range. If you spend 10 minutes in contact with a Cursed creature or object, you learn the nature of the Curse but not the knowledge of how to remove it.
